person.persName: Robert Cyrus Allison (Caldwell County, Kentucky, teacher, physician)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, teacher and physician. Mecklenburg County, North Carolina, native. Married to Catherine Weiss Allison in Floyd County, Indiana in April 1844. Father of John Edmund Allison. Married to Elvira B. McCarty Allison in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on February 17, 1848. Father of Elijah Edward. Allison, Robert Henry Allison, and Sarah "Sallie" Ann Allison. Attended medical school in Louisville. Teacher in Caldwell County in 1850. Physician in Princeton in 1860.
